Rulings.Edison:
●If the monster Special Summoned with “Celestial Transformation” is flipped face-down, then it is not destroyed during the End Phase.
●You can activate “Torrential Tribute” after a monster is Special Summoned with the effect of “Celestial Transformation”.
●You can activate “Inferno Reckless Summon” if the Fairy Special Summoned by the effect of “Celestial Transformation” has 1500 ATK or less after it is halved.
●If you Special Summon “The Agent of Force – Mars”, its ATK will still be halved and it will be destroyed during the End Phase. It is affected because it was not yet on the field when “Celestial Transformation” resolved.

Rulings.Base:
1. If the monster Special Summoned with "Celestial Transformation" is flipped face-down, then it is not destroyed during the End Phase.
2. You can activate "Torrential Tribute" after a monster is Special Summoned with the effect of "Celestial Transformation".
3. You can activate "Inferno Reckless Summon" if the Fairy Special Summoned by the effect of "Celestial Transformation" has 1500 ATK or less after it is halved.
4. If you Special Summon "The Agent of Force - Mars", its ATK will still be halved and it will be destroyed during the End Phase. It is affected because it was not yet on the field when "Celestial Transformation" resolved.
